Token.Abstract: Convenience subclass of UIImageView to work with the message's attachments. It can be set to show the message's thumbnail or to show an image attached to the message.
Sets the message for the sender.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: message with an attachment to display.

Parameter.Name: thumbnailMode
Parameter.Abstract: if YES the sender will display the thumbnail for the message. If NO the sender will show the image attached to the message.

Token.Abstract: The delegate to be notified when the imageview has been tapped. For details about the methods that can be implemented by the delegate, see BXUAttachmentImageViewDelegate Protocol Reference.
The delegate to be notified when the imageview has been tapped. For details about the methods that can be implemented by the delegate, see BXUAttachmentImageViewDelegate Protocol Reference.
